Web Developers and Designers

A simple and open set of REST API to easily create new apps for the connected home.

Lelylan API

A simple, open and consistent REST API to access every physical devices in your house through a unique URL. With wrappers in Angular, Ruby, Node.js and more, you can get started in minutes.

Dev Center →

Third party apps

Create new apps based on web, mobile, energy saving, spatial motion interaction, augmented reality, speech recognition, smart surfaces, neural based interfaces and anything else you like to work with. It's time to play with the connected home.

See existing projects →

Github love

Lelylan releases part of its work on Github as open source. This is a great way to show developers how to use Lelylan and this is way we have released projects like the Device Component, Lelylan Dashboard and Lelylan Demo.

Lelylan on Github →

Web designers creativity

We have built the Device Component to give the final user a unique user interface to control any device. This solution gives great flexibility, but limits the user experience. Start creating new creative and shiny device specific components for lights, locks, thermostats and more.

Fork the device component and give it a new style →

Simulation first

With Lelylan you do not need any physical hardware to get started. Every device, when not connected to the physical world, simulates its behaviour. This means that you can start building your apps without any additional cost.

Technologies

Lelylan uses as core techs Ruby and Node.js for the backend and AngularJS for the frontend. We also support realtime notifications, OAuth2 authorization and the CORS specs to allows cross-domain communication from the browser.

We are developers too
